forum.name: Reflecting on Session 6.1
forum.intro:
In Session 6.1, we looked at univariate and bivariate data distributions from Mr. Garcia’s class. Over a three-year period, he collected data on the amount of time his students spent studying for quizzes and tests as well as their average test scores. You explored some of that data and used visual representations to describe patterns and relationships in the data.

Reflect on Session 6.1 and share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Thinking back to the questions we answered as a group and in your small breakout rooms, respond to the following:

  1. Which of the activities would be accessible to your adult learners? (Refer to the two handouts for a summary of these activities: Looking at Individual Variables in Mr. Garcia’s Data and Looking for Relationships Between Two Variables.)
  2. Which activities would be less accessible? Could you make any modifications to make them more accessible?

Remember to read and respond to others’ postings. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
